sections.name: Control Type
sections.description: Is this control AI specific, Cloud specific, or applicable to AI and Cloud

selection_options.name: AI-Specific
selection_options.description: This control is AI security specific and does not apply to cloud security

selection_options.name: Cloud-Specific
selection_options.description: This control is cloud security specific and does not apply to AI security

selection_options.name: Cloud & AI Related
selection_options.description: This control applies to both the cloud security and AI Security
